document.full_text: for the residents of florida's space coast, the approaching end of the shuttle program brings a mix of pride in what they helped build and frustration that america has no new spacecraft ready to launch the next generation of explorers.
document.title: pride and frustration mark end of shuttle flights
lines_and_colors: for the residents of florida's space coast, the approaching end of the shuttle program brings a mix of pride in what they helped build and frustration that america has no new spacecraft ready to launch the next generation of explorers.
